text: This is a list of programs that are currently and formerly broadcast by MTV Classic (formerly known as VH1 Classic). ==Current programming== ===Music video blocks=== All programming listed is currently 6 hour-long automated blocks of videos: {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="width:75%;text-align:center;" ! scope="col" style="width:40%;" | Title !! scope="col" style="width:14%;" | Year(s) airing |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | 120 Minutes || August 8, 2016-present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | 90s Nation || August 2, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Artist Spotlight Playlist || 2018–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Classic Christmas || 2018–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | House of Pop || August 3, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | I Want My 80s || August 4, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Metal Mayhem || August 12, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text- align:left;" | MTV Classic Videos || August 1, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Rock Block || August 5, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Total Request Playlist || August 2, 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Tribute Playlist || 2016–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | VH1 Hip Hop Honors Playlist || 2017–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | VMA Performer Spotlight/Nominees Playlist || 2018–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | VMA Video Vanguard Playlist || 2018–present |- | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Women's History Month || 2018–present |- jhnu | scope="row" style="text-align:left;" | Yo!
